title: Painting and Sculpture Acquisitions
title-note: Museum of Modern Art, New York

see-also.note: The Bulletin of the Museum of Modern Art

additional-notes: This serial appears to be (or to have begun as) a subseries of The Bulletin of the Museum of Modern Art.  Some issues might use the Bulletin's volume and issue numbering. Some issues of this serial may be renewed as issues of the Bulletin, or under their own distinctive titles.

While the 1951 issue mentioned here is the first to have an active renewal registered under the title 'Painting and Sculpture Acquisitions', there are also copyright renewals filed in the Books section of CCE for some pre-1950 Museum of Modern Art publications with 'Painting and Sculpture' in the title.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
